extendedInfo.description: This live wallpaper lets you display animated GIF images (like cinemagraphs) in the background of your home screen.Please note that this is a "Lite" version and so displays a tiny watermark in the corner, plus ads in the settings screen. If you like the app please support us and either buy the "Pro" version on the Market or donate $1.99 in-app to remove the watermark (but not the ads)!Features: * Consumes very little power and CPU, thanks to a custom built, highly optimized native GIF-decoder library -- much improved from AnimGIF Live Wallpaper 1 * All Android 2.1 (and later) devices are supported that can use live wallpapers * All GIF files - including very large ones - are supported, no exceptions!  * You can select multiple GIF files to be played after each other, or to be shuffled randomly * You can choose from a couple of image scaling modes to fit the images onto the screen * Enhanced GIF file picker with thumbnail images to quickly find your favourite GIF-sIf you are experiencing any issues, please write us an e-mail -- instead of a comment to which we cannot respond.A NOTE ABOUT PERMISSIONS: * "Full internet access" -- is needed to check if you have donated * "Read phone state and identity" -- is needed to identify who has donated: we generate a unique random number based on your phone, but none of the phone's specifics are collected * "Modify/delete SD card contents" -- is required to access GIF files on your SD-card

reviews.title: Omfg
reviews.comment: Best app I\'ve used so far. The free version allows you to customize the wallpaper as much as you want which is pretty awesome. Definitely an app worth keeping. THANKS!
reviews.author: kyiele benjamin

reviews.title: Awesome but
reviews.comment: Awesome app works well does everything it says on the tin. It could be easier to change the home screen separately from the lock screen.  One problem after I installed this to my s3 I can\'t get the ripple effect for slide to open anymore.
reviews.author: Ty Johnston

reviews.title: Worked great!
reviews.comment: This app truly works and does smooth transitions between several gifs ^-^ definitely a recommended download!
reviews.author: shante hall

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This app works really well, the only thing is it takes a while to load the gif whenever I go back to my menu, so it\'s black for a while. Other than that, it\'s an amazing app!
reviews.author: Adrian Lo Monaco

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: Lovely app. But after I updated to JellyBean, I can\'t apply the wallpaper for my lock screen.  But overall, it\'s awesome and satisfying.
reviews.author: Haszariah Suaili

reviews.title: Got it, Put a GIF on my wallpaper. Love it.
reviews.comment: Almost negligible battery drain and run smoothly.  Nothing else to say, simply does what it is supposed to do and doesn\'t kill my phone.
reviews.author: justin tate

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: It really is a great app and I love it, but I cannot figure out how to put a gif on the lock screen. Once that\'s made a little easier, this app will deserve a perfect rating.
reviews.author: Himikai Mizorashi

reviews.title: Working great!!
reviews.comment: I love the ability to resize, change speed & other options make it useful along with DroidIris to find new gifs to use & change up. I like to use different gif/s for lock screen & wallpaper simultaneously. Worked good on my SGSII now with my Note II also
reviews.author: JD M

reviews.title: Bugs
reviews.comment: Works fine on the HTC thunderbolt. Does not have a settings option for the HTC DNA, so it works, but I can\'t use my custom gif
reviews.author: Ryan Olstad

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: I never knew that gifs could be used as wallpaper.  Found this app by accident and it works perfectly.
reviews.author: Artie Fufkin

reviews.title: HTC Sensation
reviews.comment: This is perfect  I always wanted to Be able to put a GIF As a wallpaper . This does the trick. Good job!  I will definitely. Upgrade to pro
reviews.author: Luke Atme

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been waiting for this kind of app foreverrr! THANK YOU DEVELOPER! You rock! I\'d give 100 stars for it if I could. :D
reviews.author: Jaz S.

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This app is so great! It does what it says with bo troubles, but would be nice to have the Gif play for the lock screen also. Overall, Great!
reviews.author: Brennon Moya

reviews.title: I wish
reviews.comment: I love this app to death, now i can set my favorite gif\'s from tumblr as my home screen. However recently i really wanted to set a specific gif that i found on tumblr as my lockscreen and i cant. I really wish that there was a way on this app to set a gif as my lockscreen. I thought there would be considering there is a lockscreen setting.... hrmmn
reviews.author: Caitlyn Gibson

reviews.title: Cannot find images
reviews.comment: I had to move the gifs to a different folder to use them or else it wouldn\'t work.  The app works great, but the watermark was a bad choice. It isn\'t your image and you already use adds. Low rating justified.
reviews.author: Dan Burrows

reviews.title: A little suggestion
reviews.comment: It would be great if there is a option where you just use a gif for your lockscreen while you also can use a standard jpg still image for other screens. It does eat up a bit of battery if it is on every screen. Atm is great but i will give a 4.5 stars this app. 5 stars when you have the option in next time. I will be waiting :3
reviews.author: Simeon Lai

reviews.title: Amazing however...
reviews.comment: Been loving this app so far and it\'s hard to believe it\'s free sometimes! I just really wish gif reordering could be added so I could manually select the order my gifs appeared. Keep it up guys!
reviews.author: Josh Yu

reviews.title: Love it!!!!
reviews.comment: Love this app..it does burn battery especially if you have alot of GIF...but wonderful app...which the lock screen thing would work...maybe because phone already has its own lockscreen...and would love more options of layout to GIF...some looks great stretched and others look way to skinny...or maybe some to remove the frames of the GIF...best fit u can\'t see frame but you can\'t see the whole vision of the gifs....but still great app!!!
reviews.author: Tonia Phillips

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: I love the app. Its exactly what I was looking for. The only problem is that it crashes my phone. I didn\'t have a problem till I started using it. Then it started lagging really bad till it finally froze and I had to take out the battery. I guess it takes up a lot of RAM or something. Please try to fix. Cause this is exactly what I needed. Thank you
reviews.author: James H

reviews.title: Works great! Thanks
reviews.comment: It\'s confusing to use at first and it makes me feel iffy since it seems to have ads and all and as I was trying to set it my phone was messing up. I\'m not sure how to use it but awesome
reviews.author: Belinda Phan
